item.title: How to install Encarta 96... on Windows 95... on DOSBox
item.description: The song Still Alive in the Classic Valve game Portal has the lyric: “We do what we must, because we can” I can’t think of a better way to describe what I’m about to present. Nobody needs to run Encarta 96 in a virtualized Windows 95 environment, unless there is a very particular need to feel nostalgic for mid-1990s computing. So Then, Why Exactly? item.title: Why I Stuck With Roku After Trying FireTV
